title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook pasta. Mix with eggs, cheese, bacon, and pepper. Serve hot.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Grill chicken. Cook with tomato sauce and cream. Serve with rice.
